description.value:
A multi-hued array of scales covers a dragonprism staff, forming a gradient of color, and a dragon's claw holds a gem upon the staff's head. Dragons give allies these staves as a mark of esteem. While wielding a dragonprism staff you seem fiercer, gaining a +1 circumstance bonus to Intimidation checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Demoralize]

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Gouging Claw], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Puff of Poison]
  • 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Burning Hands], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Fear]
  • 2nd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Acid Arrow], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Resist Energy]
  • 3rd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Fear], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Lightning Bolt]
  • 4th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Fly], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Reflective Scales]
  • 5th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Cone of Cold], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Summon Dragon]
  • 6th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Dragon Form], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Reflective Scales], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Summon Dragon]

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.
